titles.title: To amend section 1928 of the Social Security Act to extend eligibility for Medicaid payment for administration of a pediatric vaccine to all children who are not insured with respect to that vaccine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 3/4/1997--Introduced. Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to extend Medicaid eligibility for a pediatric vaccine to all children who are not insured with respect to that vaccine.
